Package com.sep.f7

package com.sep.f7
This package contains the classes for the PowerCalculator application.

The main components of this package include:

  • PowerCalculator: A class that implements the power function (x^y) with special handling for edge cases.
  • PowerCalculatorUI: A JavaFX-based user interface for the PowerCalculator application.
  • Launcher: The main entry point of the application that launches the JavaFX UI.

The application includes features such as a custom implementation of the power function, error handling, and a graphical user interface. It adheres to semantic versioning and follows industry best practices for code quality and testing.

Since:
1.0
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Launcher
    com.sep.f7.Launcher class serves as the entry point for the application.
    PowerCalculator
    A simple calculator for computing power functions (x^y) with special handling for edge cases.
    PowerCalculatorUI
    PowerCalculatorUI is an application for computing the power function x^y It provides a user-friendly graphical interface for users to input the base (x) and exponent (y), and computes the result, handling special cases and displaying errors as needed.
    UIConstants
    UIConstants class stores all the constant values used in the PowerCalculatorUI class.
